alert.note: Alert for Lenawee; Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 3:33PM EST until February 22 at 8:00PM EST by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 8 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of less than one inch and ice accumulations around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Lenawee and Monroe Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 8 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Any snow and sleet that develops in the morning hours is expected to change to freezing rain and rain for the afternoon. Temperatures are expected to be at or just below freezing. Icing should be confined to mostly elevated surfaces. Temperatures rise above 32 degrees by early evening supporting just rain for the late evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
